overview: On the penultimate round of the 2008 Brazilian Football Championship, São Paulo would play against Fluminense at home, needing a simple victory to be the Champion. In amidst of that, we follow Laura's family and her expectation, along with her brothers' and father's, to go to the São Paulo stadium, Morumbi, to watch the game, which supposely everyone would attend.
title: A Home Fan Match
